history.message: Planifica un viaje a Lisboa para tres días

✈️ Encontré 5 vuelos hacia Lisboa:
- UX1159 06:30–06:50 (27.52 EUR)
- UX1153 10:25–10:45 (40.52 EUR)
- UX1155 14:55–15:15 (40.52 EUR)
- TP3960 18:00–18:20 (49.52 EUR)
- UX1157 18:55–19:15 (50.52 EUR)

🏨 He encontrado 5 hoteles en Lisboa:
- HOTEL DO LAGO
- HOTEL DA LOLO
- HOTEL DA PRAIA
- HOTEL DOS TEMPLARIOS
- PENSAO LAR DO ARREIRO - LISBOA

📍 Lugares recomendados en Lisboa:
• Lisboa Games Week — Lisboa Games Week, or simply LGW, is a trade fair for video games held annually at the FIL Exhibition Centre in Lisbon, Portugal. It is organised by FIL
• Lisbon Oceanarium — The Lisbon Oceanarium (Portuguese: Oceanário de Lisboa, pronounced [ɔsi.ɐˈnaɾi.u ðɨ liʒˈβoɐ]) is an oceanarium in Lisbon, Portugal. It is located in the
• Lisbon Zoo — (Jardim Zoologico de Lisboa) is a zoological garden in Lisbon, Portugal. It was founded in 1884. The zoo was originally located in the park of São Sebastião
• Praça do Império — Império (Empire Square) is a city square and park situated adjacent to principal monuments and tourist attractions in the civil parish of Belém, municipality
• Casino Estoril — de Notícias (in Portuguese) Gibbs, Erik (2022-10-28). "Portugal's Casino Lisboa and Casino Estoril to Remain in the Ho Family". Casino.org. Retrieved 2025-02-28

🧭 Resumen: Lisbon is the capital and most populous municipality of Portugal, with an estimated population of 575,739, as of 2024, within its administrative limits and 3,028,000 within the metropolis, as of 2025. Lisbon is mainland Europe's westernmost capital city, and the only one along the Atlantic coast, the others being on islands. The city lies in the western portion of the Iberian Peninsula, on the northern shore of the River Tagus. The western portion of its metro area, the Portuguese Riviera, hosts the westernmost point of Continental Europe, culminating at Cabo da Roca.

🗓️ Plan 72h:
 Día 1: Visita Santa Justa Lift; Visita Praça do Império
 Día 2: Visita Santa Justa Lift; Visita Lisbon Zoo
 Día 3: Visita Lisbon Oceanarium; Visita Lisbon Zoo

🧭 Resumen: Paris is the capital and largest city of France, with an estimated city population of 2,048,472 in an area of 105.4 km2 (40.7 sq mi), and a metropolitan population of 13,171,056 as of January 2025. Located on the river Seine in the centre of the Île-de-France region, it is the largest metropolitan area and fourth-most populous city in the European Union (EU). Nicknamed the City of Light, partly because of its role in the Age of Enlightenment, Paris has been one of the world's major centres of finance, diplomacy, commerce, culture, fashion, and gastronomy since the 17th century.

🗓️ Plan 72h:
 Día 1: Visita Tourism in Paris; Visita Lists of tourist attractions
 Día 2: Visita List of sights and historic places in Budapest; Visita List of tourist attractions in Berlin
 Día 3: Visita List of tourist attractions in Paris; Visita Lists of tourist attractions
